title: The plot of the cinema/theatre can be developed at par with AR
clause_text: The plot of the cinema/theatre can be developed at par with AR. For the plot area, up to 2000 sq. m, 40 % of BUA as per Zonal (basic) FSI and incase of the plot area more than 2000 sq. m, 40 % plot area & built up amenities to the extent of 50% of the Zonal (basic) FSI of the plot shall have to be handed over to MCGM free of cost & free of FSI.
